summary: Project includes deploying an update that uses a provided logo asset.
known_issues: Logo file not provided/attached yet; need the user to upload the logo asset before it can be applied.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Square brand logo with transparent background, centered with comfortable padding (kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Square favicon, simplified and centered, transparent background (kslab-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
- Square favicon, simplified and centered, transparent background (kslab-favicon.dim_16x16.png)
- Apple touch icon, centered with padding (kslab-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)
- Social preview image on a clean light background, logo centered and prominent (kslab-og-image.dim_1200x630.png)

existing_features.title: Generate a complete logo asset set from the uploaded image "Tech Repair Logo with Blue and Gray.jpg" and add the resulting images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames specified (logo, favicons, apple touch icon, and Open Graph image). Ensure the logo is centered, not distorted, and has enough padding to remain legible at small sizes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the product/site to use the provided logo asset (deploy the new logo to production).

Use the generated logo assets throughout the UI and HTML head: ensure the header logo and landing page hero logo use /assets/generated/kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png, and ensure frontend/index.html references the generated favicon, apple-touch-icon, and og:image assets.

projectName: Apply uploaded logo across app (UI, favicon, OG image)
